item.title: Python Throughout The Semester
item.description: Python is one of the most popular languages used in the computer science industry. It can be both easy and complex at the same time depending on the coder experience level. Before trying to do more complex coding, lets get the hang of some of the more basic codes. For the ones that are more comfortable progamming using R, this might be a good way to begin using python.
